abstract.p: *Fenton Communications names Maggie Williams president, succeeding David Fenton, named chairman, new post; Manning, Selvage & Lee names Elizabeth Krupnick to new post of senior vice president and director; Catalano, Lellos & Silverstein names Frank D'Angelo to new post of partner and strategy director; Pedone & Partners names Jim Coakley to head new unit, Perdone/1.to.1, as senior vice president and director (M)

block.p: * Maggie Williams was named president at Fenton Communications, Washington, succeeding David Fenton, who becomes chairman, a new post. Ms. Williams had most recently been consulting; before that she served as chief of staff to Hillary Rodham Clinton and assistant to the president. * Elizabeth Krupnick was named to the new post of senior vice president and director for the United States corporate practice at Manning, Selvage & Lee, New York, part of the B Com3 Group. She had been president and partner at Farago & Partners, New York. Also, Mike Marino, director for creative and strategic development at Manning, Selvage, was named to the additional new post of worldwide account director for Bristol-Myers Squibb, an advertiser that works with many units of B Com3 . * Frank D'Angelo was named to the new post of partner and director for strategy at Catalano, Lellos & Silverstein, New York. He had been interactive group director at FUEL North America, New York, part of Messner Vetere Berger McNamee Schmetterer/Euro RSCG, a unit of Euro RSCG Worldwide division of Havas Advertising.

* Maggie Williams was named president at Fenton Communications, Washington, succeeding David Fenton, who becomes chairman, a new post. Ms. Williams had most recently been consulting; before that she served as chief of staff to Hillary Rodham Clinton and assistant to the president. * Elizabeth Krupnick was named to the new post of senior vice president and director for the United States corporate practice at Manning, Selvage & Lee, New York, part of the B Com3 Group. She had been president and partner at Farago & Partners, New York. Also, Mike Marino, director for creative and strategic development at Manning, Selvage, was named to the additional new post of worldwide account director for Bristol-Myers Squibb, an advertiser that works with many units of B Com3 . * Frank D'Angelo was named to the new post of partner and director for strategy at Catalano, Lellos & Silverstein, New York. He had been interactive group director at FUEL North America, New York, part of Messner Vetere Berger McNamee Schmetterer/Euro RSCG, a unit of Euro RSCG Worldwide division of Havas Advertising.

* Jim Coakley, senior vice president and director for business development at Pedone & Partners, New York, was named to head a new interactive direct marketing unit, Pedone/1.to.1, as senior vice president and director.
